desc: Itchy Baby Co. is an evidence based natural skincare solution for little one's with sensitive & dry skin. With 100% natural ingredients, Itchy Baby Co. is specifically designed to soothe, nourish and protect precious baby skin that is prone to eczema. All products come in recycled & recyclable packaging.

layout.text:
An evidence-based skincare solution, backed by 100%
naturally sourced & scientifically proven ingredients.
